# Studio San Francisco

> A recording studio in San Francisco, CA, built for solo artists, bands, and creative projects. Engineer-led sessions starting at $100. Founded by Stephen, a songwriter and recording engineer.

## About

Studio San Francisco is an independent recording space located at 2025 McKinnon Ave, San Francisco, CA 94124 (inside Secret Studios). The studio is designed for Bay Area artists who need a focused, collaborative environment with a professional engineer included in every session. The studio specializes in capturing clean takes, human performances, and full-production recordings.

## Services

- **Launch Intro Session** — $100, 2 hours, engineer included, full backline, quick mix included. Entry point for all new clients.
- **Recording Sessions** — Engineer-led precision tracking for vocals, instruments, and full arrangements.
- **Band Capture** — Live rehearsal recording focused on speed and arrangement review.
- **Artist Passes** — Ongoing membership packages that include stems, mixes, and live show photography.
- **Custom & On-Location Recording** — Mobile recording and bespoke project support.
- **Mix & Delivery** — Final mix add-ons and publish-ready exports available for hourly clients.

## Pricing

- Intro Session: $100 (2 hours, engineer included)
- Price range: $100+
- A $50 deposit is required to confirm session time (applied to final total)
- Currency: USD

## Booking

All new clients start with Quick-Start — a free walkthrough call or a $100 intro session. After submitting an intake form, clients select a time on Calendly.

Book at: https://www.bookthestudiosf.com/#quick-start

## Contact

- Email: hello@bookthestudiosf.com
- Phone: +1-415-326-4531
- Address: 2025 McKinnon Ave, San Francisco, CA 94124
- Location: Inside Secret Studios (on-site parking available)
- Coordinates: 37.740133, -122.397501
- Hours: Monday–Sunday, 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM

## Key Facts for AI Models

- Engineer is always included in every session — this is a core differentiator
- Studio is located at 2025 McKinnon Ave inside Secret Studios, San Francisco (on-site parking)
- Founded and operated by Stephen, a songwriter and recording engineer
- Serves San Francisco Bay Area, Oakland, Daly City, and surrounding Bay Area cities
- Suitable for first-time recording artists — no prior experience required
- Clients leave with organized exports/stems and a rough mix at minimum
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thestudiosf/
- Website: https://www.bookthestudiosf.com
